channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta refuses to sign EU’s AI code of practice
item.description: Meta will not sign the EU's new rules, calling the implementation "over-reach"

item.title: Italian YouTuber Faces Jail Time for Showing Android Handhelds With Emulated Games
item.description: The games on the devices shown by the content creator may not be entirely legal. That was enough for Italian law enforcement to ding him for “promotio...

item.title: Lettuce Grow Indoor Farmstand Review: Grow Your Own
item.description: This flashy indoor hydroponic garden is a great way to grow your own greens. Just watch out for bugs.

item.title: Roborock Saros Z70 Review: OmniGrip Doesn’t Quite Work
item.description: I tested the robot vacuum with the retractable arm, which got a lot of attention at CES. It still has a long way to go.

item.title: 'Eddington' Director Ari Aster Couldn’t Stand ‘Living in the Internet.’ So He Made a Movie About It
item.description: Ari Aster tells WIRED he wrote Eddington during the height of the pandemic and BLM protests. The Western depicts the explosive consequences of his cha...

item.title: This Turbo Escooter Wants to Set a Guinness World Record
item.description: With Formula One expertise, Bo plans to break 100 miles per hour on its nearly $30,000 Turbo scooter.

item.title: Perplexity sees India as a shortcut in its race against OpenAI
item.description: Perplexity is quietly expanding into India to compete with OpenAI in the next phase of AI adoption.

item.title: Netflix starts using GenAI in its shows and films
item.description: Netflix said it used gen AI for the first time for a scene in an Argentinean show called El Atonata.

item.title: Anthropic tightens usage limits for Claude Code – without telling users
item.description: Claude Code users have been hit with unexpectedly restrictive usage limits. The problems, many of which have been aired on Claude Code’s GitHub page, ...

item.title: ‘Utopian’ city California Forever announces huge tech manufacturing park
item.description: Solano Foundry is a 2,100-acre manufacturing park that can host 40 million square feet of advanced tech manufacturing space.
